'''Light Conches''' are found in the [[Three Realms Gateway Offering]] [[Three Realms Gateway Offering/Area|event area]]. When interacted with, it will restore a small amount of energy for the [[Bokuso Box]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Three Realms Gateway Offering 1.png
|text1  = While Enkanomiya is covered in darkness, Light Realm Sigils can be obtained by {{Color|help|opening chests}}, {{Color|help|unlocking waypoints}}, and {{Color|help|completing exploration objectives}}. You may offer them up at the statue to upgrade the Bokuso Box and strengthen its {{Color|help|corrosion resistance}} and obtain various {{Color|help|abilities that will help in exploration}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Three Realms Gateway Offering 2.png
|text2  = Choose the "Recuperate" option at the statue to clear {{Color|help|the accumulated Corrosion}} from nearby Travelers and recharge the Bokuso Box's energy to full. You may also capture Coral Butterflies or touch Light Conches to restore a small amount of energy for the Bokuso Box.
|image3 = Tutorial Three Realms Gateway Offering 3.png
|text3  = The Bokuso Box's maximum upgrade level will increase as the event phases are unlocked. If you encounter a darkness that you cannot pierce, wait a few days. A greater power to combat these shadows shall soon be yours.
|image4 = Tutorial Three Realms Gateway Offering 4.png
|text4  = When you explore darkened Enkanomiya, you can also obtain Light Realm Cores by {{Color|help|opening Luxurious Chests}}. Each Light Realm Core can be used at the Statue of the Vassals to activate any Bokuso Art. The Bokuso Arts will help you explore and fight.
}}
